data.name: MOMO.EXE 2 - Official Soundtrack DLC
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains the full versions of all the soundtracks from "MOMO.EXE 2" created for you by "myuu". You can easily play it by Steam Music Player. You can also find the MP3 versions in your game folder.

Track list (20 total):
1. myuu - Carmen Habanera (Georges Bizet Cover);
2. myuu - Deck The Halls (Christmas Cover);
3. myuu - Down the Rabbit Hole;
4. myuu - Evil Returns;
5. myuu - Ghost Town;
6. myuu - Gymnopedie No. 1 (Classical Cover);
7. myuu - In the Hall of the Mountain King (Classical Cover);
8. myuu - Into the Depths;
9. myuu - Keep Going;
10. myuu - March of the Titans;
11. myuu - Nightmares;
12. myuu - Play with Me;
13. myuu - Restless Dreams;
14. myuu - Run!;
15. myuu - Spooky Place (Horror Soundscape);
16. myuu - Storytime;
17. myuu - Suspicious;
18. myuu - The End Is Always Near;
19. myuu - Trembling (Horror Soundscape);
20. myuu - Wasted Wonderland;

Buying the DLC you support the developer.

data.short_description: This DLC contains the full versions of all the soundtracks from "MOMO.EXE 2" created for you by "myuu". You can easily play it by Steam Music Player. You can also find the MP3 versions in your game folder.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: Windows 7 (x64)
  • 处理器: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • 内存: 4 GB RAM
  • 图形: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • 存储空间: 需要 300 MB 可用空间
  • 声卡: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统

mac_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • 处理器: 2.0 GHz
  • 内存: 2 GB RAM
  • 图形: 512 MB VRAM
  • 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
mac_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统

linux_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: Ubuntu 14.04 (x64)
  • 处理器: 2.0 GHz
  • 内存: 2 GB RAM
  • 图形: 512 MB VRAM
  • 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
  • 声卡: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
